/* BoardMapper.ListBoard */
SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.BOARD_NAME, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_TYPE_CODE, CD.CODE_NAME AS BOARD_TYPE_CODE_NAME, B.BOARD_ORDER, B.MAIN_SHOW_YN, B.USE_YN, COUNT(1) AS ARTICLE_COUNT FROM CO_BOARD B LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.BOARD_ID FROM CO_ARTICLE A WHERE A.DELETE_YN = 'N' ) B1 ON B1.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = B.BOARD_TYPE_CODE AND CD.UP_CODE_ID = 'BOARD_TYPE_00' WHERE B.DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY B.BOARD_ID ORDER BY B.BOARD_NAME

/* BoardMapper.ListMainBoard */
SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.BOARD_NAME, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_TYPE_CODE, CD.CODE_NAME AS BOARD_TYPE_CODE_NAME, B.BOARD_ORDER, B.MAIN_SHOW_YN, B.USE_YN FROM CO_BOARD B LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = B.BOARD_TYPE_CODE AND CD.UP_CODE_ID = 'BOARD_TYPE_00' WHERE B.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND B.MAIN_SHOW_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY B.BOARD_ORDER, B.BOARD_NAME

/* BoardMapper.GetBoard */
SELECT B.BOARD_ID, B.BOARD_NAME, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_TYPE_CODE, B.BOARD_ORDER, B.MAIN_SHOW_YN, B.USE_YN FROM CO_BOARD B WHERE B.BOARD_ID = ?BoardId

/* BoardMapper.AddBoard */
INSERT INTO CO_BOARD ( BOARD_NAME, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_TYPE_CODE, BOARD_ORDER, MAIN_SHOW_YN, USE_YN, CREATER_ID ) VALUES ( ?BoardName, ?BoardContent, ?BoardTypeCode, IFNULL(?BoardOrder, ( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(B.BOARD_ORDER), 0) + 1 FROM CO_BOARD B )), ?MainShowYn, ?UseYn, ?CreaterId ) ;SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

/* BoardMapper.UpdateBoard */
UPDATE CO_BOARD SET BOARD_NAME = ?BoardName, BOARD_CONTENT = ?BoardContent, BOARD_TYPE_CODE = ?BoardTypeCode, BOARD_ORDER = IFNULL(?BoardOrder, ( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(B.BOARD_ORDER), 0) + 1 FROM CO_BOARD B WHERE B.BOARD_ID != ?BoardId )), MAIN_SHOW_YN = ?MainShowYn, USE_YN = ?UseYn, UPDATER_ID = ?UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE BOARD_ID = ?BoardId

/* BoardMapper.RemoveBoard */
UPDATE CO_BOARD SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', UPDATER_ID = ?UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE BOARD_ID = ?BoardId
